由理子:紧急情况，死后世界爆发了僵尸病毒.Translation: Yuriko: Emergency! A zombie virus has broken out in the afterlife world.

由理子:我们需要前往Guild获取武器以消灭僵尸.Translation: Yuriko: We need to go to the Guild to get weapons to eliminate the zombies.

由理子:马上行动，游佐，你来带路.Translation: Yuriko: Act quickly, Yousuke, you lead the way.

游佐:收到，请各位现在前往体育馆.Translation: Yousuke: Understood, everyone please head to the gym now.

游佐:基地Guild在体育馆正下方.Translation: Yousuke: The Guild base is directly below the gym.

游佐:不过体育馆正门被锁住了,请走侧门.Translation: Yousuke: However, the main door of the gym is locked, please use the side door.

游佐:小心,前方发现天使.Translation: Yousuke: Be careful, an angel has been spotted ahead.

游佐:她好像有点不太对劲（注意小奏的音速手刃）.Translation: Yousuke: She seems a bit off (watch out for Kanade's Hand Sonic).

由依:小奏为什么要袭击我们？.Translation: Yui: Why is Kanade attacking us?

由理子:糟了,还记得之前的影子怪物吗？.Translation: Yuriko: Oh no, do you remember the shadow monsters from before?

由理子:看来这病毒和影子怪物一样可以控制人类.Translation: Yuriko: It seems this virus can control humans just like the shadow monsters.

由理子:可恶，虽然很想救她，但是我们现在自保都困难.Translation: Yuriko: Damn it, I really want to save her, but it's hard to protect ourselves right now.

由理子:好在她看来没有生命危险.Translation: Yuriko: Fortunately, she doesn't seem to be in life-threatening danger.

由理子:我们先去Guild，再想办法.Translation: Yuriko: Let's go to the Guild first and then think of a way.

游佐:Guild的入口在舞台下方.Translation: Yousuke: The entrance to the Guild is below the stage.

游佐:开关在第一台电脑处.Translation: Yousuke: The switch is at the first computer.

游佐:守住这里，我来开门.Translation: Yousuke: Hold this position, I'll open the door.

游佐:舞台下方的暗门将在30秒后打开,守住这里.Translation: Yousuke: The secret door below the stage will open in 30 seconds, hold this position.

游佐:门开了,快走.Translation: Yousuke: The door is open, hurry up!

由依:等等,这里的陷阱为什么还是开着的.Translation: Yui: Wait, why are the traps still active here?

由依:难道他们想杀了我们吗？.Translation: Yui: Do they want to kill us?

由理子:不对，应该是僵尸正在入侵这里.Translation: Yuriko: No, it should be the zombies invading here.

由理子:他们开启了陷阱防御,全体注意小心陷阱！.Translation: Yuriko: They have activated the trap defenses, everyone be careful of the traps!

游佐:岩石将在15秒后破碎.Translation: Yousuke: The rocks will break in 15 seconds.

游佐:注意,岩石后面道路的尽头有一个可怕的陷阱.Translation: Yousuke: Be careful, there's a terrible trap at the end of the path behind the rocks.

由理子:都给我守住这里！不许后退！.Translation: Yuriko: Everyone hold this position! No retreat!

游佐:C4将在15秒后爆炸.Translation: Yousuke: The C4 will explode in 15 seconds.

游佐:注意！这里是滚石陷阱！.Translation: Yousuke: Watch out! This is a rolling stone trap!

游佐:玻璃门将在5秒后关闭.Translation: Yousuke: The glass door will close in 5 seconds.

游佐:小心了！前方是送终鸡的刀光剑影！.Translation: Yousuke: Be careful! Ahead are the laser blades from the chicken!

游佐:躲不开的话会被它用最好的手法切成两半！.Translation: Yousuke: If you can't dodge, you'll be sliced in half by its best techniques!

游佐:岩石将在25秒后破碎.Translation: Yousuke: The rocks will break in 25 seconds.

游佐:注意！岩石后面是天花板坠落陷阱！.Translation: Yousuke: Watch out! There's a ceiling drop trap behind the rocks!

游佐:门开之后一定要跑起来！.Translation: Yousuke: You must run as soon as the door opens!

游佐:注意脚下的红色地板.Translation: Yousuke: Watch out for the red floor beneath you.

游佐:如果我没记错的话,这里的地板会碎！.Translation: Yousuke: If I remember correctly, the floor here will break!

游佐:请靠着白色柱子前进！.Translation: Yousuke: Please move along the white pillars!

游佐:下面是水淹....Translation: Yousuke: Below is flooded with water...

游佐:很抱歉..我不会游....Translation: Yousuke: I'm sorry... I can't swim...

（游佐顺着水流被冲走了...）（我们失去了游佐的踪迹...）.Translation: (Yousuke was swept away by the current...)(We lost track of Yousuke...)

由理子:小心！注意旁边的风扇！！！.Translation: Yuriko: Be careful! Watch out for the fan nearby!!!

由理子:加油！我们很快到终点了！！！.Translation: Yuriko: Keep it up! We'll reach the finish line soon!!!

查理:果然不愧是由理子，居然能通过这么多陷阱来到Guild最深处.Translation: Charlie: As expected of Yuriko, she managed to get through so many traps to reach the deepest part of the Guild.

查理:我是查理,Guild的负责人,守住最后的30S.Translation: Charlie: I'm Charlie, the head of the Guild, hold the position for the last 30 seconds.

查理:剩下的就交给我了！让这帮僵尸尝尝我的大杀器！.Translation: Charlie: I'll take care of the rest! Let these zombies taste my big weapon!

由理子:大杀器？你们又做出了什么东西？.Translation: Yuriko: Big weapon? What have you all made?

查理:我们把坦克造出来了，厉害吧？！.Translation: Charlie: We built a tank, isn't it impressive?!

由理子:坦克？！你们居然能造出这种级别的武器？！真厉害！！.Translation: Yuriko: A tank?! You actually managed to create a weapon of this level?! That's amazing!!

查理:那当然！也不看看我们是谁.Translation: Charlie: Of course! Just look at who we are!

查理:准备看好戏吧！.Translation: Charlie: Get ready to watch the show!

查理:全体进入掩体，准备炮击！.Translation: Charlie: Everyone get into cover, prepare for bombardment!

查理:3,2,1！什么？居然炸膛了？果然不了解结构的话造不出来啊.Translation: Charlie: 3, 2, 1! What? It actually backfired? If you don't understand the structure, you can't build it!

由理子:笨蛋！不会造的东西不要乱造啊！会死人的！.Translation: Yuriko: Idiot! Don't create things you can't build! It can be deadly!

由理子:全体进入电梯，准备引爆Guild基地.Translation: Yuriko: Everyone get into the elevator, prepare to blow up the Guild base.

由理子:让这些僵尸沉睡于此吧！.Translation: Yuriko: Let these zombies sleep here!
